name: Invaders of Space (aerial301)
description:
Controls:
- Move: WASD / ZQSD / Arrow keys

- Shoot: IJKL

Art:

- Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/funkyfuture-8

- explosion: https://opengameart.org/content/explosion by Cuzco: https://opengameart.org/users/cuzco

- Enemies and player sprites are generated by https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-sprite-generator

- Spinning Coin Sprite: https://validifyed.itch.io/spinning-coin-sprite" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://validifyed.itch.io/spinning-coin-sprite by validifyed: https://validifyed.itch.io/

- Enemies shots derived from Rotating Orbs: https://opengameart.org/node/78832 by AntumDeluge: https://opengameart.org/users/antumdeluge

- Explosion Set 1 (M484 Games): https://opengameart.org/content/explosion-set-1-m484-games by Master484: http://m484games.ucoz.com/

- Seamless Sky Backgrounds: https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/seamless-sky-backgrounds" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/seamless-sky-backgrounds by screamingbrainstudios: https://screamingbrainstudios.itch.io/

Sounds:

- All sounds generated by https://labbed.itch.io/labchirp and then modified.
